titleInfo.title: Country Music and Derby Show at the Louisville Fairgrounds

mods.abstract: One color window card (black on white) announcing a Country Music Derby Show with Stonewall Jackson, Bob Luman, Waylon Jennings, Roy Acuff, Dottie West, and Jim Ed Brown at the Louisville Fairgrounds on April 29. Poster features metal photoplates of Stonewall Jackson, Bob Luman, Waylon Jennings, Roy Acuff, Dottie West, and Jim Ed Brown.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
